name: Burst Shooter
summary: "Burst Shooter" is a fun and creative game developped by one person. Control this little cute bird to fight against waves of armies of balls. Only when the balls hit the edges of the screen will they burst! You can push the balls to the edges with the bullets you shoot or with the bird itself. The more balls bursted, the faster you leveling up, the faster the bird upgrades and evolves, and the faster you can shoot! Excitement is guaranteed all the way through!
